0:
until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

[kubernetes]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  desc = "Tripp Lite 1500VA SmartUPS"
  vendorid = "09AE"
  productid = "2012"

MONITOR kubernetes@localhost:3493 1 upsmon secret primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = secret
  upsmon primary
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit

mkdir -p /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg && cp /insserver.cfg /data/serverfiles/insurgency/cfg/insserver.cfg && cp /motd.txt /data/serverfiles/insurgency/motd.txt && chown -R 1000:1000 /data && echo "Setup complete"

[rack-ups]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  vendorid = "10AF"
  productid = "0001"
  product = "LiebertPSI"
  serial = ""
  vendor = "Emerson Network Power"
  bus = "002"

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR rack-ups@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
